import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function UserRegister(){ const [provId, setProvId] =useState(0) const [province, setProvince] = useState('') function fetchProvince(){ fetch("https://api.goapi.id/v1/regional/provinsi?api_key=zQARyGqSW5EgMYd4lzBWM3zTHPEjCk") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((json) => setProvince(json.data)) } return(
<>{fetchProvince()}
